comments.body: I recommend we add some logging here to indicate the the speech to text operation finished. Also it might be useful to log the `recognize_result` for debugging purposes.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +130,134 @@        )
        recognize_dict = MessageToDict(recognize_result)

        self.log.info("recognition operation finished", recognize_dict)

comments.body: Is it possible for us to persist the translation to GCP storage like AWS S3 instead of relying on `xcom` to pass translation from task to task?

This approach would significantly change the logic of this operator. The best approach would be to create a separate operator for that. You can open a feature request issue for that in airflows [Jira](https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/AIRFLOW/issues)
I am fine with implementing that in a separate PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +153,157 @@            )
            self.log.info('translated output: %s', translation)
            return translation
        except ValueError as e:
            self.log.error('An error has been thrown from translate speech method:')
